translations: n.长笛；细长酒杯，高脚玻璃酒杯；长笛音栓；（柱上的）凹槽；（裙子等衣物的）褶子，圆凹褶
v.<文>吹笛子（或管乐器）；用长笛般优美的声音说话；制作凹槽；给（衣服）加褶边，加荷叶边

sentences.sentence: There was a little wooden flute in there. I tootled on it and passed it around.
sentences.translation: 这有个小木笛，我拨弄了一会儿然后给了别人。

sentences.sentence: In the interval a blond boy dressed in white serenaded the company on the flute.
sentences.translation: 幕间休息时,一位白衣金发的男孩用长笛为来宾演奏了一支小夜曲。

sentences.sentence: Marsyas thought he could play the flute better than Apollo and challenged the god to a contest.
sentences.translation: 玛息阿觉得他长笛吹得比阿波罗好，便向这位神发出挑战。
